channel.title: CVE Feed for Realtek -- RTL8111EP-CG
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Realtek -- RTL8111EP-CG

item.title: CVE-2022-32967|2024-08-03T07:54:03.438Z -- realtek -- rtl8111ep-cg
item.description: RTL8111EP-CG/RTL8111FP-CG DASH function has hard-coded password. An unauthenticated physical attacker can use the hard-coded default password during system reboot triggered by other user, to acquire partial system information such as serial number and server information.
